column5: Microsoft Corp  co-founder Paul Allen  who had been suffering from non-Hodgkin's lymphoma  a form of cancer  passed away at the age of 65 on Monday  his family said. | Video

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen dies at 65
column5: Oct 15 Microsoft Corp co-founder Paul Allen  who had been suffering from non-Hodgkin's lymphoma  a form of cancer  passed away at the age of 65 on Monday  his family said.

column4: Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen dies at 65
column5: Oct 15 Microsoft Corp co-founder Paul Allen  who had been suffering from non-Hodgkin's lymphoma  passed away at the age of 65 on Monday  his investment firm said.
BRUSSELS  Oct 15 The following are mergers under review by the European Commission and a brief guide to the EU merger process:

column4: Rivals ARM and Intel make peace to secure Internet of Things
column5: LONDON Rival semiconductor giants ARM and Intel  have agreed to work together to manage networks of connected devices from both firms  clearing a major stumbling block to market growth of the so-called Internet of Things (IoT).
